title: Water Beads Luminous Refill Ammo Gel Ball Glow in The Dark for Blaster Gel Gun 7-8 mm -3000pcs 50g
features: Glow-In-The-Dark Water Beads： they glow in the dark by placing them under direct sunlight or light source in the room for 5-7 hours before or after hydration. The longer exposed to light the longer they'll glow.
Easy To Use: Soaking in cold water for 4-5 hours, and soak up light for a while before they will glow in the dark.

Multipurpose: A novelty item for adults of all ages ! They can be used for sensory play, Halloween, imaginative play and more. They are also suitable as moisture retainers for gardening and pot/vase floriculture.
Harvest Size：7-8 mm,50 grams of Glow-In-The-Dark water beads.(about 3000pcs)
description: Safe and recyclable Non-fading, Non-toxic, Non-flammable and Not easy to break. Has good flexibility and toughness.The gel beads are reusable, easy to store, and cleaned to dehydrate them for reuse. Warming NoteNot edible. Package Included: 1 X Water Beads（50g,about 3000pcs）
